default.description: Explore Artificial Intelligence lab assignments focusing on graph traversal, heuristic search algorithms, game tree strategies, constraint satisfaction problems, and greedy algorithms for optimization.

questions.question: Implement depth first search algorithm and Breadth First Search algorithm using an undirected graph and develop a recursive algorithm for searching all the vertices of a graph or tree data structure.
questions.title: Depth First Search and Breadth First Search

questions.question: Implement A star (A*) Algorithm for any game search problem.
questions.title: A* Algorithm Implementation for Game Search

questions.question: Implement Alpha-Beta Tree search for any game search problem.
questions.title: Alpha-Beta Tree Search Algorithm

questions.question: Implement a solution for a Constraint Satisfaction Problem using Branch and Bound and Backtracking for n-queens problem or a graph coloring problem.
questions.title: Constraint Satisfaction Problem using Branch and Bound and Backtracking

questions.question: Implement Greedy search algorithm for any of the following applications: Selection Sort, Minimum Spanning Tree, Single-Source Shortest Path Problem, Job Scheduling Problem, Prim's MST, Kruskal's MST, or Dijkstra's Algorithm.
questions.title: Greedy Search Algorithm Implementations

questions.question: Develop an elementary chatbot for any suitable customer interaction application.
questions.title: Elementary Chatbot Implementation
